package.description: roscreate contains tools that assist in the creation of ROS filesystem resources. There are currently two tools that it provides: roscreate-pkg and roscreate-stack. roscreate-pkg creates a new package directory, including the appropriate build and manifest files. roscreate-stack computes a stack.xml file from a list of packages in a directory.
package.author: Ken Conley/kwc@willowgarage.com
